scripts.coverage: npm run coverage:app-unit && npm run coverage:app-full && npm run coverage:html
scripts.coverage:app-unit: COVERAGE=1 COVERAGE_APP_FOLDER=$PWD/ COVERAGE_OUT_COVERAGE=true COVERAGE_OUT_JSON=true TEST_BROWSER_DRIVER=phantomjs meteor test --once --driver-package meteortesting:mocha --raw-logs
scripts.coverage:app-full: COVERAGE=1 COVERAGE_APP_FOLDER=$PWD/ COVERAGE_IN_COVERAGE=true  COVERAGE_OUT_JSON=true TEST_BROWSER_DRIVER=phantomjs meteor test --once --driver-package meteortesting:mocha --raw-logs --full-app
